text: The District of Columbia Auditor may conduct random audits of certification files to determine whether the Department followed the requirements set forth in § 2-218.61. The District of Columbia Auditor shall submit findings and recommendations to the Department and the Council.
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For Law 18-141, see notes following § 2-218.02.

DC CODE § 2-218.65

Current through December 11, 2012

subchapter.text: Small, Local, and Disadvantaged Business Enterprise Development and Assistance.
